deprecated.notes: The API was removed by the Facebook SDK 4.x and up.

properties.name: auxiliaryViewPosition
properties.summary: Position of the auxiliary view (social sentence or count box) in relation to the button.
properties.description:
Set to one of the following values:

  • top: Position the auxiliary view above the button
  • inline: Position the auxiliary view next to the button
  • bottom: Position the auxiliary view below the button

properties.name: foregroundColor
properties.summary: Text color of the social sentence as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: horizontalAlign
properties.description:
Set to one of the following values:

  • left: Left align the button in the parent view.
  • center: Center the button in the parent view.
  • right: Right align the button in the parent view.

properties.name: likeViewStyle
properties.description:
Set to one of the following values:

  • box_count: Button with a total like count box.
  • button: Button without social sentence or count box (Deprecated and removed in 5.0.0).
  • standard: Button with the social sentence ('x number of users like y').

properties.name: objectId
properties.summary: Page URL or Open Graph object ID to like.
properties.description: This property must be set before rendering the button.

properties.name: objectID
properties.summary: Page URL or Open Graph object ID to like.
properties.description: This property must be set before rendering the button.

properties.name: objectType
properties.description:
Set to one of the following:

  • page: Page object.
  • openGraphObject: Open Graph object.
  • unknown: Unknown object. The Facebook server will try to query for the object.

properties.name: soundEnabled
properties.summary: Determines if a sound should be played when the button is clicked.
